name: Revelo
category: Specialized Talent Platform / Software Development / HR Tools
purpose: Platform for hiring pre-vetted, English-speaking remote software developers from Latin America with end-to-end administrative support
description: Revelo is a comprehensive remote-first staffing solution specializing in connecting companies with high-quality software developers from Latin America. The platform features the largest network of pre-vetted English-speaking developers (300,000+ pool), all in the same time zone as the United States. Revelo handles all administrative tasks including payroll, benefits, taxes, and local compliance, making it a hassle-free experience for companies. The rigorous vetting process assesses technical skills, English proficiency, and soft skills. Matching is fast (3-5 days for shortlist) and includes a dedicated matching team. Offers 14-day no-cost guarantee with replacement if unsatisfied.
cost_structure: Custom quotes (estimated $30-$70/hour); all-inclusive pricing covers developer salary + payroll/benefits/taxes/compliance management
